title: Larry Summers Says Now Is Not The Time For ‘Moral Hazard Lectures’ About Bailouts
description: Lawrence Summers, an economist who worked in both the Clinton and Obama administrations, has been tweeting up a storm this weekend, advocating for a complete bailout of Silicon Valley Bank, which collapsed on Friday after a bank run reportedly led by billionaire Peter Thiel.

title: Silicon Valley Bank Collapse Is A Blow To Clean Energy Tech, Regardless Of What Happens In The Next 24 Hours
description: The impact of the above is not to be understated. Even in instances where deposits are made whole, the credit facilities for clean tech companies with SVB are likely no longer available, and this is a sector where those are critical.

title: #BORG: Here’s The Latest College Drinking Trend On TikTok And The Dangers
description: BORG stands for “blackout rage gallon.” A BORG drinking challenge on March left 46 University of Massachusetts Amherst students hospitalized.

title: Is Freddy The Longest-Living Tropical Cyclone In Recorded History?
description: Cyclone Freddy lasted over a month and made multiple landfalls in Africa. What records has it broken and are more to come?

title: What Spending 12 Billion Hours Per Day On Social Media Has Taught Us
description: Lyons says it is because we are all too talkative, and I tend to agree.

title: Near Eradication Of The Neglected Tropical Disease Guinea Worm Is One Of President Jimmy Carter’s Legacies
description: Since 1986, the Carter Center has been a pioneer in neglected tropical disease prevention, control, and elimination. And because of President Carter’s philanthropic deeds the world has come incredibly close to wiping out Guinea worm.

title: Values-Driven 2V TrueESG™: A Right-Wing ESG Rating Methodology For Taking Down ESG
description: A recent op-ed piece in the WSJ discusses a study purporting to say that ESG doesn't pay. The ESG data for this study come from the proprietary methodology Values-Driven 2V TrueESG™ developed by 2ndVote Analytics. Surreal, I know. An anti-ESG group using its own ESG methodology to take down ESG.

title: Why Climatologists Know La Niña Is Over - The Answer Includes No Rodents
description: Here's why scientists know La Niña is over for now and the groundhog was not in the equation.

title: TikTok Has A New ‘Bold Glamour’ AI-Powered Filter, Here Are The Risks
description: TikTok has released its new Bold Glamour filter that can remodel your face in an unreal way that looks very real. And it's already garnered real interest.

title: Extreme E Could Switch To Become The First Hydrogen-Only Race Series
description: Extreme E is aiming to become the pioneering race series for hydrogen power, switching away from battery-only.

title: Federal Trade Commission Aims To Bring Down The Hammer On Those Outsized Unfounded Claims About Generative AI ChatGPT And Other AI, Warns AI Ethics And AI Law
description: FTC (Federal Trade Commission) has renewed its warnings that those unfounded outsized claims about AI in products and services will not be tolerated. AI makers and AI marketers are fully on-notice, warns AI Ethics and AI Law.

title: Extreme E Is First Sport Powered By ‘Completely Clean’ Energy
description: Extreme E claims its racing in Neom, Saudi Arabia is the first sporting event powered entirely by clean energy. But could this be the start of something bigger?

title: NuraTrue Pro Earbuds Offer Custom Sound And Exceptional Spatial Audio
description: These NuraTrue Pro earbuds offer superb spatial sound and support for various codecs and Qualcomm's Snapdragon Sound platform.

title: No Sleep, No Stars, No Migrating Birds: It’s Time We Talked About Light Pollution
description: More than 80% of people worldwide live under light-polluted skies where artificial light threatens human health and wildlife. Now a major new exhibition will highlight the threat—and pose solutions.
